name: @wesley/scaffold-multitenant
description: Wesley Multi-tenant SaaS Scaffold - Production-ready GraphQL schema and CLI

scripts.test: bash -lc 'shopt -s globstar nullglob; files=(test/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,mjs,ts,tsx} src/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,mjs,ts,tsx}); if [ ${#files[@]} -gt 0 ]; then vitest; else echo "No test files in @wesley/scaffold-multitenant; skipping"; fi'

author: Wesley Team
